title: (x) Tommy Hilfiger T 2 - hand lettered {Mark S}
content: Definitely hand lettered. Notice how the m's differ and how none of the connections between characters is the same. You would also have trouble using that y in the middle of a word.
author: Mark Simonson

comments.content:
Check out [this thread](http://web.archive.org/web/20050816164625/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/37650.html) for links to lots of monoline scripts you could use/tweak to approximate the logo.   
   
And time to put on my Captain Obvious hat: 'hilfiger girls' is [Gill Sans Bold](http://web.archive.org/web/20050816164625/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/gill-sans/bold/testdrive.html?s=hilfiger%2Bgirls&p=48). =)
